hasWhiteBackground.fieldDescription: Enable to set White background color for the list
hasWhiteBackground.name: ./hasWhiteBackground

thoughtLeadershipVariation.fieldDescription: Enable to apply Thought Leadership Formatting to the list
thoughtLeadershipVariation.name: ./thoughtLeadershipVariation

isPlacedBelow.fieldDescription: Check to place the VIEW ALL link below the Row Items
isPlacedBelow.name: ./isPlacedBelow

listSelection.fieldLabel: Select the type of List Component
listSelection.name: ./listSelection

number.fieldDescription: Number of Events to be displayed. Min-1, Max-5
number.name: ./numberLimit

viewEventDetailsLabel.fieldDescription: Label for View Details link of each Event
viewEventDetailsLabel.name: ./viewEventDetailsLabel

enableBorder.fieldDescription: Check to enable Grey Border for each Row Image
enableBorder.name: ./enableBorder

blogsnumberLimit.fieldDescription: Number of Blogs to be displayed. Min-1, Max-5
blogsnumberLimit.name: ./blogsnumberLimit

viewBlogDetailsLabel.fieldDescription: Label for View Details link of each Blog
viewBlogDetailsLabel.name: ./viewBlogDetailsLabel
